item.description:
It's time for me to attempt my first 4,000 footer.  I want to do it before the weather gets unbearably hot.  I have chosen Mt Tom as my first peak, because it is supposed to be a beautiful trail, not horribly steep, with some good views at the top!

I would like to have 8 people total on this hike!  Three of you should be people like me, who are also just getting into hiking and want to try your first 4,000 footer.  And the other four should be experienced and patient hikers who will come along and cheer us on as we (slowly) make our way up to the top!  (Anyone who has hiked with me knows my tortoise-like pace...but my stamina has really improved!)

All RSVPs will be wait-listed for now.  When you RSVP, please tell me why you would like to do this!  I want to make sure that the people who sign up are really going to SHOW up before making the final list!

I will be staying at the White Mountains Hostel in Conway afterwards...anyone is welcome to join me.  It's a nice hostel - very comfy and clean, with a full kitchen, living room, washer/dryer and pretty spacious rooms - and cheaper than a campsite! http://www.whitemountainshostel.com/index.html
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the Crawford Depot
item.name: My First 4,000 Footer
